Notes: A winged ? Block that spawns items when hit. WingBlockCoin grants a single Coin whereas WingBlockStarPiece grants eight Star Bits when hit. It can move on a path or remain stationary.

Obj_arg0.Name: Movement Speed
Obj_arg0.Description: Sets the rate at which it moves on the path. Default is 4.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The optional path that it can move on.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.
